metadata.dc:author: García, M
López de Argumedo, I
Quesada, J L
Lorente, J
Galindo, J
Quesada, P
Mateu, F
Perelló, E
metadata.dc:description: The AA. present a retrospective study of all instances diagnosed as mucoceles in the last 15 years (1978-1993) at General University Hospital, Valle de Hebrón. Age of occurrence and sex, foregoing pathologic history, clinical picture, diagnostic tests, treatment and subsequent course of the condition are duly considered and appraised. Our attempt has been to stablish a diagnostic clinical pattern of these conditions, which generally are uncovered through its complications.
metadata.dc:title: Mucoceles. Revisión de nuestra casuística en los últimos 15 años.
[Mucoceles. Review of reported cases in the last 15 years].
